title: Fitness Tracker
description: Fitness tracker that allows users to log their workouts, track progress, and manage their profiles with secure authentication, including Google sign-in.
technology: What I used: JavaScript, React.js, Firebase, HTML, CSS. You can view the code and the project plan on GitHub.

title: Interesting Fact Generator
description: Web app utilizing ChatGPT to deliver curated facts based on user input, primarily focused on animals. It features a chat-like interface for user interaction, providing a seamless experience for exploring interesting facts about favorite animals. Might take longer to load bc I'm using free version to host my project.
technology: What I used: JavaScript, React.js, HTML, CSS, Express.

title: Reusable Infinite Scroll Component
description: This project demonstrates a reusable Infinite Scroll component using React and JavaScript. The component dynamically fetches and displays data from an API as the user scrolls down the page.
technology: What I used: JavaScript, React.js, HTML, CSS, Axios.

title: Recipes App
description: I've developed a Recipe App using React, leveraging libraries like framer-motion, react-router-dom, and styled-components. It offers search functionality and presents recipes across four cuisine categories, along with sections for Popular and Veggie picks on the main page. I've integrated Spoonacular.com's API for data sourcing.
technology: What I used: JavaScript, React.js, HTML, CSS.

title: UI/UX Animation Gallery Website
description: Animated Gallery created with parallax effect when scrolling. I created animated background that repeats the colors of the images and blends smoothly from one to another with Blur effect.
technology: What I used: JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

title: Image Gallery Mouse Move Effect
description: Created an image gallery which moves with the mouse position.
technology: What I used: JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

title: Picture me (Similar to Pinterest)
description: Photo sharing social media application. Users can login and register through custom page using Google Authentication. Image of each bin can be downloaded, destination URL and also save it. You can leave comments under each picture.
technology: What I used: React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

title: Marvel Universe Online Chat
description: Created with React Chat App. You can send text and images from your profile. Login page, online statuses, and functionality, icons telling you who read the message, image support, sound notifications, the ability to create multiple rooms. Login: maincharacter Password: 123123
technology: What I used: React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

title: Yosemite Best Hikes
description: Yosemite hikes page where you can sort trails by difficulty.
technology: What I used: React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

title: To Do List
description: A dynamic and aesthetic To Do list Website. User-friendly, displays current date and time.
technology: What I used: HTML, CSS and Vanila JavaScript

title: Snake Game
description: A simple snake game created with the React JS library.
technology: What I used: React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
